page.title: 16FAMILY LIFE
page.content: In Gordon most families are together at night and in the morning.The children set off for school and the father to work.The mother is left on her own to do the daily chores or else go to work.At lunch the family might meet again. At night when everyone's home they have dinner and a family chat.Later at night when the dishes are washed and so on the family will sit down beside the fire and watch T.V.Some of the family might play a board game or they might make something.Mother might go to the rural or to a sale of work and father and children might watch T.V, play a game or something.When mum comes home the children would go to bed and later mum and dad would come.At the weekends families might go on a day trip somewhere because everyone's at home. On Sundays they might go to church.
